description: Yeehaa holds a master's degree in Media Studies and extensive experience in technology and digital consulting. He has worked on high-impact projects in consulting, product development, and educational technologies. Skilled in public speaking, Yeehaa explores decentralized ecosystems and innovative ecosystem architecture through his blog and course offerings.
blurb: Biological ecosystems are defined by space and time, but modern ecosystems transcend these. Ecosystem architecture proposes decentralized, non-hierarchical structures inspired by diverse disciplines.
